docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Why ReAct Is Not Enough
docs.text: ReAct (reasoning + acting) is a useful baseline, but it often fails in real systems without explicit state, constraints, and evaluation loops.

docs.title: Missing pieces in practice
docs.text:
• Durable memory with clear read/write semantics
  • Explicit plans and step budgets
  • Guardrails: schemas, validators, sandboxing
  • Feedback: tests, critiques, automated checks
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass(frozen=True)
class StepBudget:
    max_steps: int = 12
    max_tool_calls: int = 20
